item.description:
Confetti combines three generations of mediterranean heritage, the finest ingredients, prepares them to order, and presents them in a spacious facility with great style.   Owners Joan and Peter Lemnotis’s mission is to please the pallet, the eye and the soul!  And that they do.

Come join us for a fabulous brunch. Check it out...

omelet station & eggs as you like...carving station...roast sirloin of beef...belgium waffle station with all the fixings...french toast...eggs benedict...fresh fruits...bacon & sausage...homefries and cheese...two casseroles du jour... rice pilaf & pasta of the day...danish, bagels, and croissants...salads and breads...dessert station, cakes and candies   BTW...includes a champagne, momosa or juice.

*15.95 per person plus tax and tip.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or Colleen...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: BRUNCH MUNCH @ Confetti's in Plainville!
